articles.description: Jurgen Klopp is angered by Liverpool's performance in their Europa League defeat at Toulouse - and the noisy home fans drowning out his media conference.
articles.title: 'Chaotic' Liverpool anger Klopp in loss at Toulouse

articles.description: West Ham move a step closer to reaching the Europa League knockout stages with a narrow victory over Olympiakos at London Stadium.
articles.title: Hammers beat Olympiakos to edge closer to knockouts

articles.description: Brighton boost their hopes of reaching the knockout stages of the Europa League with a comfortable win over a youthful Ajax side in Amsterdam.
articles.title: Brighton boost qualification hopes with win at Ajax

articles.description: Rangers strengthen their hopes of progressing to the Europa League knockout stages as they survived a nervy finish to beat Sparta Prague at Ibrox.
articles.title: Rangers edge out Sparta to bolster Europa hopes

articles.description: New Zealand look set for a World Cup semi-final spot after comfortably beating Sri Lanka by five wickets.
articles.title: New Zealand beat Sri Lanka to all but reach semis

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look back at some of the greatest late goals in Premier League history, featuring Sergio Aguero, Harry Kane and Demarai Gray.
articles.title: Aguero, Kane and Gray in best Premier League last-minute goals

articles.description: The father of the Liverpool footballer was handed over to UN and Catholic Church officials.
articles.title: Footballer Luis Díaz's father freed by Colombian guerrillas

articles.description: Aberdeen are eliminated from the Europa Conference League despite Jamie McGrath's sensational free kick snatching a point against PAOK Salonika.
articles.title: Aberdeen eliminated from Europe after PAOK thriller

articles.description: Following his record-breaking double century to guide Australia into the World Cup semi-finals, Glenn Maxwell joins No Balls: The Cricket Podcast.
articles.title: 'My whole body was shaking' - Maxwell on record 201

articles.description: Watch highlights as New Zealand secure an easy five-wicket win over Sri Lanka in Bengaluru to all but seal a World Cup semi-final spot
articles.title: New Zealand on brink of semis after easy win over Sri Lanka
